title: chambre studio  dans cour très recherché
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


rent independent studio room homestay. In a flowery courtyard, rare and highly sought after in Paris, 2 minutes from Belleville metro station.
looking for calm and respectful tenant. ideal for student.
the price of the rent is 900 euros per month all inclusive.
available from 3 january .
no parties allowed.
animals are not allowed.
no smoking inside.
